content: jasmine is a 10 inch square which can be used for many project made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook approx 124 m /138 yards of yarn needed the colours i used are white and pistachio all my squares are designed to fit together you can find more free or paid squares on my designers page if you want to see more of my work and want to stay up to date for new patterns then please visit my face book page https //www facebook com/something-crochet-1875698805791418/ happy hooking
